search.query: | union [| rest splunk_server=local /servicesNS/-/-/data/indexes | search [| rest splunk_server=local /servicesNS/-/-/configs/conf-alert_manager/settings | fields index | rename index as title ] | stats count | eval Results=if(count==1, "Ok", "Failed"), Check="Check that index is created on Search Head" ] [| rest splunk_server=local /servicesNS/-/-/authentication/users | search roles="alert_manager" title!=admin | stats count | eval Results=if(count>0, "Ok", "Warning"), Check="Check that non-admin users have been assigned the admin_manager role" ] [| rest splunk_server=local /servicesNS/-/-/authentication/users | search roles="alert_manager_user" title!=admin | stats count | eval Results=if(count>0, "Ok", "Warning"), Check="Check that non-admin users have been assigned the admin_manager_user role" ] [| rest /servicesNS/-/-/apps/local | search title="TA-alert_manager" version="2.3.1" | stats count | eval Results=if(count=0, "Ok", "Warning"), Check="Check for deprecated TA-alert_manager" ] [| rest /servicesNS/-/-/apps/local | search title="TA-alert_manager" version!="2.3.1" | stats count | eval Results=if(count=0, "Ok", "Warning"), Check="Check for incompatible TA-alert_manager" ] [| inputlookup alert_status | search builtin=1 | stats count | eval Results=if(count=15, "Ok", "Failed"), Check="Built-in alert statuses deployed"] [| inputlookup email_templates | search template_file=default_incident_created.html OR template_file="default_incident_assigned.html" OR template_file="default.html" | stats count | eval Results=if(count=3, "Ok", "Failed"), Check="Default Email Templates deployed"] [| inputlookup notification_schemes | search schemeName="default_notification_scheme" | stats count | eval Results=if(count=1, "Ok", "Failed"), Check="Default Notification Schemes Deployed"] [| rest splunk_server=local /servicesNS/-/-/saved/searches | search action.alert_manager.param.auto_previous_resolve=1 | stats count | eval Results=if(count=0, "Ok", "Warning"), Check="Check for deprecated Alert Action Option \"Auto-resolve previously opened identical incidents\""] [| rest splunk_server=local /servicesNS/-/-/saved/searches | search action.alert_manager.param.auto_subsequent_resolve=1 | stats count | eval Results=if(count=0, "Ok", "Warning"), Check="Check for deprecated Alert Action Option \"Auto-resolve if there is a pre-existing identical incident\"" ] | table Check, Results
